allow: Bash(powershell.exe -NoProfile -Command "Write-Host ''Test 1: Chargement du module...''; try { Import-Module .\PowerShell\ScubaGear\ScubaGear.psd1 -Force -ErrorAction Stop; Write-Host ''Module charge avec succes'' -ForegroundColor Green } catch { Write-Host ""Erreur: $_" -ForegroundColor Red }")

Bash(powershell.exe -NoProfile -Command "Import-Module .\PowerShell\ScubaGear\ScubaGear.psd1 -Force; Write-Host ''Module charge avec succes''; Get-Module ExchangeOnlineManagement | Select-Object Name, Version")
